name: RiverWar
description:
1.  Game history

Inspired by old game River Raid published in 1982 by Activision for Atari 2600.

First version of the game was created with Unreal Engine. Released here version is created with Unity as learning project.

2. Game story

Destroy as many enemies as possible. Survive and return to the base after the mission. Fight in many locations with different weather condition. Survive and finish all levels.

3. Game play

Choose from three different fighters. Finish level and land on runway. During your mission remember to refuel. Try to finish 25 levels. You have four tries for this.

Sterring:

  • Turn left: "left arrow" or "A"
  • Turn right: "right arrow" or "D"
  • Speed up: "up arrow" or "W"
  • Slow down: "down arrow" or "S"
  • Shoot: "space"
  • Quit: "ESC"

4. Development

The development is freezed. There should be done few things to make it better:

  • score
  • high score board
  • maybe some ambient music
  • improve models
  • improve plane selection
  • maybe more levels
